entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 102,154Chapters: 37/?Kudos: 183

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren‚Äôt the only danger, here‚Äôs hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: A lover or a friend
entry.summary:
Author: Helloloveyes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,858Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 58

Summary: "We both really need a good fuck." Stiles finished his glass of water and looked up to see both of Derek's eyebrows shoot up. "What? It's true! We-" Wait, oh. "Oh! No, I meant- I mean you are not into dudes, otherwise I would most definitely propose that." "And you are?" Derek seemed honestly surprised. How could he not know? Stiles had been lusting after him since the second he laid his horny teen eyes on that perfectly sculptured body, a face carved by angels, a jaw sharp enough to cut marble. "In theory? Yeah, I like boys, just‚Ä¶" He threw his hands up, fingers splayed, trying to convey his tangled thoughts into coherent words. "I've never been with one." He was always the wingman or designated driver when he went out with his college friends, too paranoid to get drunk without his pack around. "Mhm." Derek‚Äôs eyes narrowed slightly, a familiar crease forming between his brows as he looked deep in thought. Stiles was assaulted at how much wanted to smooth it up with his fingers. "What?" he finally asked. The werewolf's ears turned a lovely red, but his face showed no change at all when he spoke. "Maybe we should."

entry.title: A Lonely Wolf Howls
entry.summary:
Author: brianRyanBio

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,145Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 13

Summary: A Teen Wolf Rewrite. This work is an attempt at fixing the things that annoy me about teen wolf and creating an actual timeline. In January of 2011 half of a woman's body is found in the Beacon Hills Preserve. As the Sheriffs department tries to find the second half of her body a series of events is set off changing the course of this small towns future and bringing together a pack of traumatized teenagers. In other words. Derek just wants to find his sisters murderer without Stiles and Scott getting in the way. Stiles wants Scott to admit he's a werewolf and to figure out what is going on. Scott wants to be a normal boy. Allison misses San Francisco and is just trying to fit in. Lydia is clinging to the top of the food chain. And Jackson wants to know where Scott is getting his juice.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,332Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 45

Summary: "Just get a ride home with Derek." First of all, how dare his dad! Because Stiles had reminded his dad‚Äîmultiple times‚Äîto book the damn flight before prices went up, but Sheriff Stilinski forgot, and now Stiles is trapped in Derek Hale‚Äôs self-modified, apocalypse-ready Toyota FJ Cruiser for a twelve-hour drive home in a snowstorm with nothing but mutual hatred and unresolved teenage grudges for company. What starts as a petty road trip filled with aggressive silence, judgmental snack commentary, territorial road navigation, and one deeply inconvenient bathroom emergency slowly tightens into something unbearably tense, something electric. It's the kind of disaster that feels inevitable, the kind where you know things are going to go wrong. And oh‚Äîthey go very, very wrong.

entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 846

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:‚ÄúWhat day is it?‚Äù Derek demanded. ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù ‚ÄúThe day! What day is today?!‚Äù Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn‚Äôt human. No human could stand that still. When it was clear Derek wasn‚Äôt going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Wednesday.‚Äù ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs impossible,‚Äù Derek whispered. ‚ÄúNot really, it comes around every seven days.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis is impossible,‚Äù Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.
